title: Atomic Scale Investigation Between the Heterointerfaces in BaTiO3 and Ultrawide Band-Gap Semiconductors
content: Barium titanate BaTiO3 (BTO) is a perovskite oxide with high dielectric constant and attractive ferroelectric properties [1]. This work looks to characterize the atomic structure of two novel applications of BTO, within a high electron mobility transistor (HEMT), and hybrid extreme-k/low-k insulator metal-oxide-semiconductor capacitor (MOSCAP).
